Parameter.name: user_watershed_id
Parameter.description: ID of the watershed for which we wish to predict the seasonal streamflow.

Parameter.name: user_horizon
Parameter.description: Forecast horizon in days.

Parameter.name: datasets
Parameter.description: Name of the regional database file encompassing hydrological, climatic, and geological data from various watersheds.

Parameter.name: version
Parameter.description: Application version: can be an execution version (application) for a user or a test version (test) for a developer.

Parameter.name: date
Parameter.description: Application date at which we would calculate streamflow projections.

Parameter.name: n_clusters
Parameter.description: Number of clusters for the watershed classification using KMEANS.

Parameter.name: time_step
Parameter.description: Variable time step (can be daily 'D', weekly 'W' or monthly 'M').

Parameter.name: similarity_period_calculation
Parameter.description: Similarity period calculation between two timeseries.

Parameter.name: ndays_before_forecast
Parameter.description: Number of days before the forescast day (or current date).

Parameter.name: metric
Parameter.description: method for quantifying correlation between two time series

Parameter.name: scale
Parameter.description: conversion scale used in similarity calculation

Parameter.name: selection_method
Parameter.description: selection method for extracting top scenarios from the correlation matrix

Parameter.name: minimal_threshold
Parameter.description: minimum threshold for extracting top scenarios from the correlation matrix

Parameter.name: maximal_percentage
Parameter.description: maximal_percentage for extracting top scenarios from the correlation matrix

Parameter.name: n_scenarios
Parameter.description: Number of top scenarios from the correlation matrix
